It’s increasingly clear that President Trump and his agenda are confronting not just a so-called deep state, but a "counter-state" — an institutionalized effort to subvert and otherwise thwart our elected chief executive.

And then there are those who formerly engaged in such activity, like ex- CIA Director John Brennan, who are now publicly urging their colleagues still on the inside to refuse to follow the President’s legal orders.
Frank Gaffney, Jr. is president of the Center for Security Policy (CSP), a columnist for The Washington Times, and host of the nationally syndicated program, Secure Freedom Radio.
Specifically, they seek to block the declassification of documents detailing the counter-state’s efforts to defeat him — before and after the 2016 election.
New undercover videos by James O’Keefe’s Project Veritas identify individuals nominally working for the president, but actually working against him.
What’s underway is a full-blown crisis for our constitutional republic.
